item.title: Republicans Debut Transparency Bill After Uncovering Millions Of Secret Spending On China
item.description: Ernst told The Federalist she believes ‘Americans should never send a cent to China,’ but ‘you cannot stop what you cannot see.’

item.title: Bill Maher Shouldn’t Be Applauded For Taking 10 Years To Realize Trump Isn’t ‘Literally Hitler’
item.description: It only took ten years, endless smug commentary, and a private dinner for comedian Bill Maher to finally discover the obvious: President Donald Trump ...

item.title: Democrats Normalized The Same Political Violence That Torched PA Governor’s Mansion
item.description: Democrats devalue life and reward violence, but when the lines between right and wrong are blurred, our culture drifts into danger.

item.title: Unsealed Crossfire Hurricane Docs Further Prove Russiagate Was A Hoax All Along
item.description: America's intel agencies launched one of the greatest witch hunts in U.S. history to cripple Trump and undermine the will of the American people.

item.title: Trump’s Easter Message And UK’s Paganism Show Clear Choice: Christianity Or Cultural Suicide
item.description: While President Trump honored Palm Sunday, King Charles III neglected it — instead honoring a pagan holiday.
